Class ChainedRegime.Builder

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime.Builder
Enclosing class:
ChainedRegime
@Builder public static class ChainedRegime.Builder extends Object
Builder for constructing instances of ChainedRegime.

A chained regime allows multiple Regime strategies to be combined and executed in sequence. The Builder provides a fluent API to assemble the chain and produce an immutable ChainedRegime instance.

      Adds a DumpNodesRegime decorator with full configuration.
      Parameters:
      firstTime - whether to dump before the first training step
      includeInputs - whether to include input nodes in the dump
      Returns:
      this builder (for fluent chaining)
      See Also:
      • DumpNodesRegime

    • build

      protected final ChainedRegime build()
      Finalizes the builder and creates an immutable ChainedRegime.

      The returned ChainedRegime contains the current list of decorators in the order they were added. The underlying list is wrapped with List.copyOf(java.util.Collection) to ensure immutability, so further modifications to this builder will not affect the built chain.

      Returns:
      an immutable ChainedRegime representing the current builder state
      See Also:
      • ChainedRegime
